rows.label: tlk43700143_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I can't believe it. Vandham's not
the sort of bloke who just...dies.

rows.label: tlk43700143_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I'll have to go to the
Karam Ruins and pay my
respects next chance I get.

rows.label: tlk43700143_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I hear it's a den of fierce monsters,
but I'm a merc. I can handle it.

rows.label: tlk43700143_02_msg0004
rows.name:
...Then again, if I go there
alone, maybe I'm just adding one
more grave to the collection...

rows.label: tlk43700143_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Think I'll head out after I've
gathered another five of my mates.

rows.label: tlk43700143_02_msg0006
rows.name:
'Cos here in Invidia, six is
the standard number of mercs
that'd you get in a squad.
